content: If an intern has the access and authority to make a mistake so critical that it pwns your org and all of your users, the fault is with leadership and everyone else upstream from that intern. The intern deserves an apology for being put in that position at all, not public shame.

content.value:
Current and former top executives at SolarWinds are blaming a company intern for a critical lapse in password security that apparently went undiagnosed for years.

The password in question, "solarwinds123," was discovered in 2019 on the public internet. cnn.it/3pWdZqx
content.html: Current and former top executives at SolarWinds are blaming a company intern for a critical lapse in password security that apparently went undiagnosed for years. The password in question, "solarwinds123," was discovered in 2019 on the public internet. cnn.it/3pWdZqx
